description: Apple cake with a crispy cinnamon streusel topping is a favourite dessert in Ukraine.
keywords: Apple pie & tart,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Apple Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 large green apples, peeled, cored and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 170Â°C. Grease and line a 9 inch round cake tin with parchment paper.

Whisk 225g of flour, baking powder and 50g of brown sugar together in a large bowl. Add 115g of butter, cut into cubes and use a knife to cut it into the flour mix, then rub in with you hands to form a breadcrumb like mixture.
Add the cream to a bowl with the beaten egg and tip into the flour. Mix gently to form a dough. Spread the dough out in the cake tin and top with the apple slices, neatly arranged on top.
In another bowl, mix the rest of the brown sugar and flour with the cinnamon and rub in the remaining butter to form a crumbly mixture. Spread on top of the apples and bake the cake for 25 minutes.
Allow to cool, slice and serve with sour cream on top.
